item.title: Trump: Good Things Can Come Out of Russia-Ukraine Meeting
item.description: President Donald Trump on Monday welcomed the news of a meeting between Russia and Ukraine on Thursday.

item.title: Trump Admin to Increase Deportation Flights
item.description: The Trump administration reportedly is planning to increase the number of deportation flights this week, including nine to Mexico.
